properties.name: selectedStep
properties.description: Enable to select the step by it's index

properties.name: linearMode
properties.description: If this property is true, we can move next steps one by one. Default value is false

properties.name: optionalSteps
properties.description: In linear mode, we can move to optional steps, even it is not increased by linear

events.name: current:step
events.description: Event is emitted after changing the step with current step index
